last_episode_to_air.name: Date with the Devil
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Ron Ruse breaks up with his controlling girlfriend, Linda Ricchio, she vows to get him back at any cost. Soon demands turn to death threats and Ron goes on the run. But he'll quickly discover there's no escape from a fatal attraction.

name: Stalked: Someone's Watching
overview: It may seem like it, but victims of stalking are not just celebrities and those in the public eye; the widely-misunderstood crime affects millions of people in the United States each year, people who are in perpetual fear for their lives; criminal psychologist Dr. Michelle Ward -- a stalking victim herself -- presents stories of the crimes and explores the twisted psychology of those who committed them; victims and their families also recount their personal experiences and provide firsthand insight into effective steps they took to protect themselves; Dr. Ward offers practical tips that viewers can use to keep themselves safe.

episodes.name: Nowhere to Run
episodes.overview: After 3 years of emotional abuse, Peggy Klinke breaks if off with her boyfriend only to have him begin watching her every move. Police offer little help, so Peggy takes matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: Neighborhood Watch
episodes.overview: When Mary and her family move to the quiet D.C. suburbs, she finds a new best friend in her neighbor Jane. After Jane physically becomes Mary's copycat and starts spying on her, Mary ends their friendship and is promptly accused of child abuse, then attempting to run Jane over.

episodes.name: Too Close to Home
episodes.overview: Detroit single mother Harvette Williams has no idea that she's inviting an obsessive stalker into her life when she gives her business card to a one-time acquaintance, Kevin Gary.

episodes.name: Behind the Shield
episodes.overview: After 2 years of dating, police officer Amy Johnson happily marries Corrections Officer Dustin Hall, but over 6 years of marriage, he becomes a different man. She's troubled by her husband's mood swings and controlling behavior, but when she finds a suicide note he has written on her behalf, she fears for her life.

episodes.name: Dangerous Games
episodes.overview: Single mother Karen Welch gets a mysterious call on Christmas Eve. At first, she thinks nothing of it, but then starts getting dozens every day after, follow Dr. Ward through this game of cat and mouse.

episodes.name: Teenage Obsession
episodes.overview: In 1996, outgoing Cameron Wallace befriends shy geeky Ryan Clutter in a high school art class. Ryan soon becomes obsessed with her, and little does she know that Ryan will stalk her for the next ten years.

episodes.name: Dire Straits
episodes.overview: A college student in Staten Island meets a deceivingly charming man. He sweeps her off her feet but the relationship turns sour when his true nature is revealed.

episodes.name: Signed, Your Deadliest Fan
episodes.overview: For years Colleen Doran, a comic book writer and Illustrator, is plagued by mail from an obsessed fan. How can she stop him harassing her when she doesn't know who he is?

episodes.name: Six Degrees of Separation
episodes.overview: Alexis, a bright and free-spirited college graduate, lands a job as a high-tech investigator and strikes up a relationship with her superior, Ben. When he becomes abusive, her attempts to escape prove to be no match for the highly trained detective. He uses those skills to stalk her, threaten her family, and bankrupt her.

episodes.name: Love Is a Battlefield
episodes.overview: Amanda Oliver, a college student, falls in love, gets pregnant, and marries the man of her dreams - her former high school flame, Steven Beach. Before long, her new husband becomes violent and controlling. When he beats her, she divorces him, but he won't let go and begins to stalk and harass her. Will she be able to protect herself and her baby?

episodes.name: In the Spotlight
episodes.overview: Arthel Neville, a well-respected TV news journalist in San Diego, is stalked by a deranged fan who threatens to rape and kill her if she doesn't carry out his explicit instructions on air.

episodes.name: Deadly Envy
episodes.overview: When Iva's acting career takes off, her friendship with Edith sours; but her efforts to distance herself provoke a campaign of horror.

episodes.name: Out of Bounds
episodes.overview: Tracy Morris, a friendly nurse, offers odd jobs to a struggling man, Jason Michael Sharp, who quickly becomes infatuated. Despite her rejections to his advances, the younger married man becomes more aggressive and will not take "no" for an answer.

episodes.name: Burning Desire
episodes.overview: When Alberto Benitez, a successful police instructor in Kingsville, TX, breaks off a destructive relationship with his possessive girlfriend Elizabeth she vows to take revenge. Her obsession turns his life into a vicious game of survival.

episodes.name: Badlands
episodes.overview: Marie DePalma, a shy 14-year-old middle school student in Detroit, MI, is thrilled when older student Luis Cruz takes an interest in her and they start dating. As their relationship develops, her life turns into a living hell. She is sexually assaulted by her boyfriend and his friend, and then harassed relentlessly by his gang for years.

episodes.name: The Girl Next Door
episodes.overview: Hannah Perryman, a kind-hearted fifth-grader, and her younger sister, Jenna, befriend the strange girl down the block, but little do they know that their good intentions will have life-altering consequences.

episodes.name: Above the Law
episodes.overview: In small town Iowa, Vicki is being stalked by her ex, and his connections in the community mean he can harass her with impunity.

episodes.name: Off the Deep End
episodes.overview: Sheila Taormina, an Olympic gold medalist and world-class tri-athlete, begins receiving strange phone calls and letters from an obsessed fan posing as a fellow athlete. Before long, he is following her to competitions around the country and police can do nothing to stop him.

episodes.name: Web of Destruction
episodes.overview: Mai Hlee Xiong is a beauty pageant contestant fresh out of college. A stalker is watching her every move and he'll stop at nothing to defame her good reputation.

episodes.name: Kiss of Death
episodes.overview: Lee Redmond has a beautiful wife, a healthy baby girl, and just won his first title as a heavyweight kickboxer. When Lee helps a woman in need, exotic dancer Nicole Thornton, he finds himself the object of what could soon become a fatal attraction.

episodes.name: Power Play
episodes.overview: Jane Haag, a successful software consultant in Orange County, CA, rarely has time to date but then she meets Ron. They quickly fall in love, move in together and get engaged, but she later discovers that he is a virtual time bomb about to explode. Ron becomes abusive and, after Jane leaves him, he targets her friend, robs her home, and attempts to sabotage her career.

episodes.name: Evil Intent
episodes.overview: Andrew Bagby, a Canadian medical student, starts dating fellow student Shirley Turner, 12 years his senior, but doesn't want a serious relationship. After graduation, Andrew accepts a job in the U.S. and break things off with Shirley, who isn't ready to let him go.

episodes.name: The Bogeyman
episodes.overview: Sherry Meinberg lives the innocent life of a teen in the 1950s when she meets handsome Charles 'Chuck' Gray. Sherry is over the moon, until the man of her dreams turns into a monster. Little does she know his deadly obsession will last a lifetime.

episodes.name: Fear F.M.
episodes.overview: K.T. Mills is a popular radio DJ with a friendly voice. But when one deranged listener becomes obsessed with the woman behind the mic, her life is turned upside down. K.T. soon learns that her fan has a gun - and he's hell-bent on making her his own.

episodes.name: Prisoner of Love
episodes.overview: Katerina is a beautiful Russian woman who thinks she's met the man of her dreams. But her dream turns into a brutal nightmare. After turning her into a slave, he frames her for a violent crime. Soon, she realizes he won't let her go until she's dead.

episodes.name: Campaign of Terror
episodes.overview: Former Congressman Bob Krueger and his wife Kathleen are devastated when Bob loses a close race for a the Senate - but nothing could prepare them for the reign of terror that their former campaign pilot, Tom Humphrey, would unleash on them. The man they once trusted with their lives now threatens to destroy them both.

episodes.name: Haunting Obsession
episodes.overview: Friendly eighth grader Tracy Lundeen offers to help the school outcast, Shawn Moul, with his homework. But when Tracy politely turns down his request for a date, her life becomes a never-ending nightmare for years. Nearly two decades later, he is released from prison - and determined to find her once again.

episodes.name: Idol Worship
episodes.overview: Jessica Sierra is an aspiring singer who earns a spot on the hit TV show, American Idol. After, a man named Daniel Young calls her claiming to be a music producer, but soon it's clear he's interested in more than just her voice. He starts stalking her relentlessly, telling her they are meant to be together. Calls turn to disturbing threats and Jessica is scared of how far he'll go to possess her.

episodes.name: Nightmare Next Door
episodes.overview: 13-year-old Jessie Cooper thinks 34-year-old Nick Hamilton is just a nice neighbor. Little does she know he's a sex offender with a penchant for adolescent girls. When Nicks sets his sites on Jessie, nothing - not even prison - will stop his twisted obsession.

episodes.name: Stalked.com
episodes.overview: When Kristen Pratt accepts a Facebook friend request from Patrick Macchione, she has no idea he's a maniac. When he starts stalking her via YouTube, she understands: Nothing will stop her cyberstalker from tracking her down with deadly intentions.

episodes.name: Devil in Disguise
episodes.overview: Sandi Musk is a successful businesswoman looking for Mr. Right. What she finds is Andy Lefleur, a handsome young man with a violent streak. When Sandi tries to call off the relationship, she is in for a nightmare beyond belief.

episodes.name: She-Devil
episodes.overview: When Tom Donato's smart and successful wife Kristin turns controlling, he vows to get a divorce. But Kristin exacts a terrible price for revenge: She frames him as a dangerous stalker. Now Tom must prove his innocence or get locked up for life.

episodes.name: Hell Hath No Fury
episodes.overview: When George Long's girlfriend, Cheryl Vivier, demands they get married, he breaks off the relationship. But Cheryl's not backing down and nothing can stop her relentless obsession. If he won't marry her, he might not live to see another day.

episodes.name: Toxic Love
episodes.overview: Robin Banker is a single mom of fraternal twins and a friendly waitress. She catches the eye of handsome customer, Ron Tooms but, after they begin a relationship, his twisted need for control bubbles to the surface. Eventually, her daughter issues an ultimatum - him or us - and she breaks up with Ron. Now, Robin must find a way to escape a ex-boyfriend who is hell-bent on destroying her.

episodes.name: Good vs Evil
episodes.overview: When Jennifer Paulson rejects the advances of college classmate Jed Waits, she unwittingly sets off a dangerous chain of events. Jed's obsession will defy all expectations and leave Jennifer guessing when and where he will strike next.

episodes.name: Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
episodes.overview: Judy Phillips is recovering from kidney disease when she meets a handsome younger man. But soon her Prince Charming reveals a heart of darkness and a taste for cruelty. When she finally breaks up with him, he hatches a deadly plan for revenge.

episodes.name: The Madonna Stalker
episodes.overview: In early 1995, music superstar Madonna is at the top of her game. But one deranged fan will stop at nothing to be with her - dead or alive. After breaking into her property, Madonna must find a way to escape from her fanatic before it's too late.

episodes.name: If I Can't Have You
episodes.overview: Kaity Sudberry is an overachieving teen with a bright future and a new boyfriend, Daniel Byrd. But when his jealousy turns to violence, she calls off the relationship. Will her family muster enough power to keep a spurned teen from the object of his obsession?

episodes.name: Twist of Hate
episodes.overview: Dawn Krohn Hillyer is a busy single mother when she dates whip-smart Mike McClellan. When Dawn's ready to move on, Mike's not willing to let her go. He begins a vicious campaign of stalking, online and off, threatening her reputation and even her life.

episodes.name: Cruel Intentions
episodes.overview: Student Christen Naujoks thinks she's met her college sweetheart in John Peck. But when he reveals his cruel nature, she breaks things off. Then a newspaper article exposes his dark past, and John stops at nothing to get revenge.

episodes.name: Playing with Fire
episodes.overview: After Vernetta Cockerham kicks her abusive ex, Richard Ellerbee, out of the house, he stalks her with deadly intent. Police won't help, so when Richard threatens murder, Vernetta must face the fight of her life—alone.

episodes.name: Off the Rails
episodes.overview: When train engineer Dinah Lynch rejects the advances of her coworker, Stanley Decker, he launches a crusade to punish her at all costs. With no help from police, Dinah's left to fend for herself, and stalking soon becomes a matter of life or death.

episodes.name: The Puppet Master
episodes.overview: Christy Martin is the toughest female boxer in the world. But outside the ring, she's blackmailed and abused by her possessive husband and coach, Jim Martin. When she leaves him for good, Christy finds herself in the fight of her life.

episodes.name: Cat and Mouse
episodes.overview: In 1981, Deborah Roberts is only 18 when she meets handsome bad-boy Steven Brown. They start dating and she soon finds out she's pregnant. At first it's a fairy tale romance, but after they marry, Deborah becomes a slave to his daily abuse. When she finally finds the courage to leave, he stops at nothing to get revenge.

episodes.name: Married to Madness
episodes.overview: Susan Zarriello thought her abusive ex-husband, David Richards, was nothing more than a bad memory. But when he unleashes a sadistic torrent of cyber attacks 15 years after their divorce, Susan realizes he's been watching her the whole time.

episodes.name: Predator by Proxy
episodes.overview: After Angell Williams kicks her cheating husband Michael out of the house and divorces him, he returns for revenge. He's briefly jailed after assaulting her, so he turns to the web. His fake sex ads send other men right to her door to act out Michael's own sick fantasies.

episodes.name: Without a Trace
episodes.overview: When Pam Dunn finally breaks free from her abusive relationship with Dave Asmussen, things go from bad to worse as Dave relentlessly stalks and threatens her. Too afraid to ask for help, Pam must fend for herself against her merciless ex.

episodes.name: The Ties That Blind
episodes.overview: Kathy Haley is thrilled when her handsome, much older husband David treats her like a prized possession – until he beats her down with insults and eventually physical abuse. Finally, Kathy escapes her prison of a marriage, but David's not about to let her go.

episodes.name: Addicted to Rage
episodes.overview: Nurse Katie Socci stands by her tall, handsome fiancé David McNamara, even after he's charged with stealing narcotics. But once she finally throws him out for sleeping with other women, he unleashes the deadly fury of a stalker scorned.

episodes.name: S&M: Sex & Malice
episodes.overview: After Ann Moulds is bombarded with sadistic letters from an anonymous stalker, she tries to get help from police. But with no stalking laws in Scotland, she's at his mercy. When she learns the secret of his identity, it turns her world upside down.

episodes.name: Gamble with Death
episodes.overview: Donna Eskew calls off her romance with Glen Johnson after he tries to take it to the next level but he won't give up. When he corners Donna in a casino parking lot with a chilling threat, she'll have to use all her wits to stay alive.

episodes.name: Hopelessly Devoted
episodes.overview: Kaia Anderson is kind to fellow student Robert Vinyard. She never imagines it will lead to a lifelong delusional obsession that won't be stopped by reason or the law. When his fantasies grow dark, Kaia has to take matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: Stealth Stalker
episodes.overview: When Terri Mendez breaks up with Jose Moreno, he pretends to move on. Little does she know, he's watching every move she makes. When she discovers hidden cameras in her bedroom, she realizes there's nowhere to hide.

episodes.name: A Virtual Nightmare
episodes.overview: Up-and-coming pop star Elle Richardson is bombarded with threatening emails from a stranger hell-bent on destroying her career and ruining her life. But Elle is determined to track down her faceless stalker first.

episodes.name: A Mother's Nightmare
episodes.overview: When Jessica Lenahan takes out a restraining order against her dangerous ex-husband, Simon Gonzales, he vows to get her back. When police won't protect her, Jessica is left to face one night of unimaginable horror that will change her life forever.

episodes.name: Death Spiral
episodes.overview: Linda Smith is hoping for love when she meets wealthy and handsome Jim McDonald. But Jim's charm lasts only as long as he doesn't drink. Unable to stay sober, Jim becomes determined to keep Linda all to himself, even if it kills her.

episodes.name: Collateral Damage
episodes.overview: Air Force Sergeant Rachel Wilson's marriage falls apart when husband Darrell starts hiring hookers. But he erupts in rage when he learns Rachel's met the perfect man, a smarter, better-looking athlete. Now, more than just Rachel's life is at stake.

episodes.name: Date with the Devil
episodes.overview: When Ron Ruse breaks up with his controlling girlfriend, Linda Ricchio, she vows to get him back at any cost. Soon demands turn to death threats and Ron goes on the run. But he'll quickly discover there's no escape from a fatal attraction.
